name: Kaleji Tikka Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Kaleji Tikka Recipe: Mutton liver ½ kg Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp Salt to taste Chili powder 1 tsp Crushed red pepper 1 tsp Turmeric ½ tsp Lemon juice 1 tbsp Thick yogurt 125 gm Cumin powder ½ tsp Oil 2 tbsp Coal as required
instructions: Cut ½ kg liver into cubes, marinate with 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste Add 125 gm thick yogurt, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt to taste, 1 tsp chili powder Add 1 tsp crushed red pepper, ½ tsp turmeric and ½ tsp cumin powder. Now add 2 tbsp oil and mix well. Thread 4 â 5 cubes in each skewer, grill on burning charcoals till done. Remove in a serving dish and serve.
